cards.title: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
cards.info: Description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

cards.title: Dark Magician
cards.info: Description: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

cards.title: Black Lotus
cards.info: Description: Adds 3 mana of any single color of your choice to your mana pool, then is discarded. Tapping this artifact can be played as an interrupt.

cards.title: Ancestral Recall
cards.info: Description: Draw 3 cards or force opponent to draw 3 cards.

cards.title: Dark Magician Girl
cards.info: Description: Gains 300 ATK for every 'Dark Magician' or 'Magician of Black Chaos' in the GY

cards.title: Charizard
cards.info: Description: All energy attached to this Pokemon are fire Energy instead of their usual type.

cards.title: Venusaur
cards.info: Description: Pokemon Power: Energy Trans, As often as you like during your turn (before you attack), you may take 1 Leaf Energy card attached to 1 of your pokemon and attach it to a different one. This pwoer can't be used if Venusaur is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

cards.title: Blastoise
cards.info: Description: Pokemon Power: Rain Dance, As often as you like during your turn (before you attack), you may take 1 Water Energy card attached to 1 of your pokemon and attach it to a different one. This pwoer can't be used if Venusaur is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

cards.title: Ten Thousand Dragon
cards.info: Description: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by Tributing monsters you control whose combined ATK & DEF is 10,000 or more. If Summoned this way, the ATK/DEF of this card becomes 10,000.
